It advocates for a National AI Talent Mission to drive education and reskilling. The roadmap positions India as a global hub for AI talent and innovation by 2035.

title: Can drinking barley water with lemon juice help in rapid weight loss
description: Many people are health conscious and seek natural ways to manage weight. Barley water, made from the grain 'jau', is a healthy option. It helps in weight loss by promoting fullness and aiding digestion. This drink also offers benefits like lowering cholesterol and controlling blood sugar. It is rich in vitamins and antioxidants.

title: Microsoft engineer quits after 13 years; sends resignation email to employees
description: A senior Microsoft engineer has resigned protesting the company's cloud contracts with the Israeli military. Scott Sutfin-Glowski cited enabling potential atrocities as his reason for leaving. This follows months of internal dissent and employee firings over Gaza-related demonstrations. Microsoft previously stopped some services to an Israeli intelligence unit after a report. However, many contracts remain active, and employee protests continue. Activists demand a complete cut of ties with Israel.
